title: Poor Yorick
body:
He just keep's getting pushed back on the Champion Update Schedule

It just seem's 

 http://media2.giphy.com/media/TZKFBveHtquAM/giphy.gif

replies.body: While I agree, what is up with you and the Spock gifs this week? XD
Did he get pushed back again?
Ryze is actually next now. So Yorick is after Ryze, but the mid year mage update is still coming before them.
MYMU is just next patch, though, so not long to wait there, then. Ryze'll probably be in the... 6.13-ish mark?
Damn, Yorick can't catch a break

He can't catch anything else either, unless it moves like a snail.

Sorta like Viktor's new E.
man, I wanna play my main sometime this year...
Ryze? Really? This is like the third time he's been reworked?
I will pull a nostradamus and say that the yoric rework will come out in October of this year, probably around Howloween.

hey man, it's still 2016, start getting angry about this sometime january 2020

Also, and I hate to do this, but I need people to proliferate a gamemode that I made, so here is a link to that post.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/E6tTagL6-an-interesting-custom-game-concept-runebattle
